title: How-to guides
summary: This section of MDN Web Docs writing guidelines contains all the step-by-step information for accomplishing specific tasks when contributing to MDN Web Docs: how we use markdown, how we add an entry to the glossary, how we move or delete pages, and more. To find out more about how to contribute (which happens through GitHub), see our contribution guidelines.
pageTitle: How-to guides - The MDN Web Docs project | MDN
